name: HYATT house Sacramento/Rancho Cordova

reviews.text: Tired from traveling, picking up rental car, and hauling around my work supplies, all I wanted to do was check into my nice hotel and relax. I arrived and the one person who was working the front desk was on the phone and would not even acknowledge that I was standing there until he was done with his long phone call.
reviews.title: Front desk service was terrible

reviews.text: The next day I went to the front desk again to get a new key and this time there was two people working the front desk. I stood there again and waited for the lady to finish doing her phone reservation to even acknowledge me. The other person apparently couldn't help me because he was counting his cash drawer.
reviews.title: Great place to wake up to a hot breakfast and good place to put your tired head down

reviews.text: Needless to say dealing with the front desk was very annoying.
reviews.title: In dire need of a stimulus package ....

likes.disliked: — It was an overall disappointing hotel.

description: The HYATT House Sacramento/Rancho Cordova blends cozy chic with the convenience of guest-empowered travel thru intelligent design, stress-free service and free-flowing amenities. Its 158 smartly designed guestrooms + suites feature flat panel TVs, MP3 docking stations and waffle terry bathrobes while free details include cook-to-order breakfast, Starbucks brewed coffee and WI-FI throughout. Sample small plates, sip and socialize at the HBAR or relax and unwind on the outdoor pool patio with cabanas and lounge seating. Conveniently located just 11 miles east of downtown Sacramento.
